content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-342-16-A
|Item_parent=Discomfort, loss of consciousness, coma in adults (see item 105)
|Item_parent_short=Discomfort, loss of consciousness, coma in adults (see item 105)
|Rank=A
|Title=Know the symptomatic treatment of malaise
|Description=None
|Heading=Management
|Contributors=
|Order=16}}
First aid treatment - Safety position - Lateral safety position if unconscious - Leg elevation if blood pressure low

question.question: What is the recommended safety position for an unconscious adult?
question.option_b: Lateral safety position with the affected side up
question.option_c: Lateral safety position with the unaffected side up
